launchDelegate.delegateDescription: The Eclipse JDT Java Application Launcher supports running and debugging local Java applications that contain or use Ceylon code.
launchDelegate.name: Ceylon-aware Eclipse JDT

launchDelegate.delegateDescription: The Eclipse JDT Java Remote Launcher supports attaching to and debugging remote Java applications that contain or use Ceylon code.
launchDelegate.name: Ceylon-aware Eclipse JDT

launchDelegate.delegateDescription: The Eclipse JUnit Launcher supports running and debugging JUnit tests and test suites that contain or use Ceylon code.
launchDelegate.name: Ceylon-aware Eclipse JUnit

launchDelegate.delegateDescription: The Eclipse Application launcher is used to run or debug a separate instance of an Eclipse application that contains or use Ceylon code.
launchDelegate.name: Ceylon-aware Eclipse Application

launchDelegate.delegateDescription: The JUnit Plugin Test launcher is used to run and debug test suites for plug-in projects that contain or use Ceylon code.
launchDelegate.name: Ceylon-aware JUnit Plugin Test

launchDelegate.delegateDescription: This test launcher is used to run and debug SWTBot tests that contain or use Ceylon code.
launchDelegate.name: Ceylon-aware SWTBot Test

commonFilter.name: Empty Ceylon parent packages
commonFilter.description: Hides empty packages which do not contain files but other sub-folders. E.g. given a package 'org.junit' where 'org' does not contain any files, this filter will hide the package 'org' but not the package 'org.junit'

commonFilter.name: Empty Ceylon module repositories
commonFilter.description: Hides Ceylon module repositories that doesn't contain any module used by the project

commonFilter.name: Ceylon output repository folder
commonFilter.description: Hides the folder used as the Ceylon output repository
